localized.name: Khovanskiy Vladimir
localized._comment: Software engineer with 14+ years of experience in all the aspects of the software development process.
localized.about:
Full-stack developer with great experience in writing Back-End side with complex business logic on .NET (C#), Oracle DB modeling and optimization, designing and implementing APIs, troubleshooting, code quality assurance. And Front-End side with responsive web-design, implementing vanilla JS UI, designing and implementing SPA screens and components on React.js.
Hardworking, responsible, motivated, reliable and flexible team player. Always learning and do my best to provide a high quality of work.
